IDCard.title: IDCard
IDCard.description: Represents a single user-created ID card.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ID Card, matches the Firestore document ID.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the card.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the card was created.

idNumber.description: A unique, human-readable ID number for the card.

name.description: The name of the person on the ID card.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth on the ID card.

photoDataUri.description: The data URI of the user's photo.

/users/{userId}/idCards/{cardId}.description: Stores ID cards created by a specific user.
